eventDecorators.name: CreateERC1155_v1
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new GrantRound contract is created.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipNominated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new GrantRound contract is created.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new GrantRound contract is created.

eventDecorators.name: TransferBatch
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new GrantRound contract is created.

eventDecorators.name: TransferSingle
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new GrantRound contract is created.

eventDecorators.name: URI
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new GrantRound contract is created.

functionDecorators.name: acceptOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Nominated Owner can accept the Ownership of the contract. Can only be called by the nominated owner.

functionDecorators.name: balanceOf
functionDecorators.description: Get the balance of an account's Tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: owner
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token holder.

returnDecorators.description: The owner's balance of the Token type requested.

functionDecorators.name: balanceOfBatch
functionDecorators.description: Get the balance of multiple account/token pairs.

parameterDecorators.name: owners
parameterDecorators.description: The addresses of the token holders.

returnDecorators.description: The owner's balance of the Token types requested (i.e. balance for each (owner, id) pair).

functionDecorators.name: certifierIdOf
functionDecorators.description: Get the Member ID of an account.

parameterDecorators.name: owner
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token holder.

returnDecorators.description: The owner's balance of the Token type requested.

functionDecorators.name: isOwner
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: nominateNewOwner
functionDecorators.description: Nominate new Owner of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: supportsInterface
functionDecorators.description: See {IERC165-supportsInterface}. Time complexity O(1), guaranteed to always use less than 30 000 gas.

functionDecorators.name: uri
functionDecorators.description: A distinct Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for a given token. URIs are defined in RFC 3986. The URI may point to a JSON file that conforms to the "ERC-1155 Metadata URI JSON Schema".
